title: Grilled halloumi and mushroom skewers with quinoa and pesto
ingredients: ['340g quinoa grains', '4 closed cup mushrooms, cut into pieces', '120g light halloumi, cubed', '4 cherry tomatoes, halved', '2 tablespoons pesto, or as needed (homemade or shop bought)', '1 teaspoon extra virgin olive oil, or as needed']
